content:
I've updated the main clinFHIR site with the new version, as the previous one is largely deprecated. Most of the functions that were formally links on the main page are now options off the 'cog' menu to the upper right.

Do let me know if there are any issues...

I'll leave the current one (http://107.170.196.80/resourceCreator.html) there for the moment - I'll probably use it for 'development' work, updating the main CF site less regularly (so it will be - hopefully - more stable)...
